title: Simplification
text: Now we have $$\log_{3}\left(3^{2x-1}\right)+\log_{3}\left(3^{2x^2}\right)-\log_{3}\left(3^3\right)$$. Note that we can use an important fact that $$\log_{b}\left(b^a\right)=a$$ to simplify further.
